title: Gamification-Enhanced Cognitive Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and problem-solving skills at the secondary school level
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based gamification tools in constrained technological environments. Students collaborate with team members to solve mathematical problems through gamified tasks, with learning outcomes measured via summative assessment at the end of the process.

learning_goals: Students can achieve problem-solving accuracy of 80% or higher through gamified mathematics assignments
Learners can manage working memory load in a gamified environment and improve task focus time by 15% or more
Team-based gamification activities can increase learners' intrinsic motivation (interest, engagement) by 20% or more compared to pre-assessment levels

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
